channel.title: New server in work
channel.description:
hey,
Garyscape is a newly formed private server, ITS STILL IN CONSTRUCTION!. so if you do decide to drop by please remember its in a beta stage atm, i want a few players online to test things for me and tell what you think, how it can be improved etc, ok ill start with the features:
BOTH SOUL WAR NPCS, AVATAR OF DESTRUCTION, AVATAR OF CREATION. ALL SKILLS WORK (IM WORKING ON CUSTOM HUNTER, CONSTRUCTION, SUMMONING AS WE SPEAK.) ALL 4 GODWAR BOSSES, (including 30 killcount to enter the godwar room, kill count goes to 0 on teleport) ALL WORKING PRAYERS, INCLUDING CHIVARLY AND PIETY AND PROTECT 1 ITEM PRAYER. FULLY WORKING BANK PINS
full slayer tower, including hd darkbeasts, jellys, abby demons, and bloodvelds, (on the unreleased client atm still adding stuff) slayer npcs need the slayer wepons or the slayer helm or there hits will be doubled
full orb enchating mini game, including cutting+fletching the staffs, attaching the orbs, and enchanting the orbs
Fully working fightpits, with working viewing orbs and timers till the next game starts Perfect wilderness levels , including attacking ranges, and no teleporting out past lvl 20 (working teleblock and venge, venge other and skulling if u attack another player, barrage freezes.
kalphite queen lair added, chaos ellemental, kbd including the posionos spiders near the lever that posion you) (GENIE LAMPS FULLY WORK, GIVING U 2K EXP IN THE SKILL OR YOUR CHOICE) RARE ITEMS ARE OBTAINED BY CHRISTMAS CRACKERS, AND CHRISTMAS CRACKERS ARE OBTAINED THREW CLUE SCROLLS LVL 3, FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY!
cluescrolls are in lvl 1, lvl 2, lvl 3 catagory, including a zamorak mage on lvl 3 clues the dfs dosent float it moves like it should, spirit shields come with sigil attatching Gilded alters work! using bones upon alter, including the stillgfx
There is trimmed and untrimmed skill capes all needing 99 to buy+wear
BUT LIKE I SAID THIS SERVER IS STILL IN A BETA STAGE, AND IS CONSTANTLY BEING UPDATED, AND IMPROVED!
heres a list of some items we have
flared pants (including lots of recolours) Gnome scarf staff capes (credits to silentcj for the modesl) all elegant colours (including pink elegant, gilded elegant, camo elegant) hween and santa recolours (including pink) all the void helms granite plate, helm, boots dragon pickaxe full jester robes (including the staff) bandos warspear (credits to silentcj for the model) r.s's new dragon platebody, plus the new look dragon legs (with the spikes) 100% credits to me for getting/converting the models
ALL PVP WEAPONS, INCLUDING PERFECTLY ANIMATED BODYS/LEGS full black elite all amulet ts powdered wigs, sleeping cap Dragon claws, bandos whip+ gloves (credits to silentcj pirate hat and eyepatch Dragon lumps and shards for the dplate (100 percent credits to me for finding/converting the model) barrow boots chinchompas cavaliar recolours beret recolours Black and gold mystic recolours armadyl staff bandos+dragon cbow (fully working) including bolts on the floor after fired (and poisoning) r.s's halloween event reward (broomstick) Gilded dhide White dhide Lave dhide pink dhide whip recolours full santa armour full ninja armour all of the ususal stuff like visage, bandos armadyl, godswords, dfh
HAVE CURRENTLY CONVERTED THESE ITEMS FROM THE R.S CACHE AND THEY FULLY ANIMATE
NEW HD LOOK PORTALS NEW HD HALLOWEEN DECORATIONS (CHRISTMAS, EASTER) NEW HD NPCS SUCH AS ADMIRAL GRAARDOR (IDK WHAT TO CALL HIM LOL) NEW HD DARKBEAST NPC NEW HD SLAYER NPCS NEW HD BARROWS NPCS+ARMOUR FULL LUNAR ROBES
FULL PUMPKIN COSTUME (H'WEEN EVENT REWARD FROM R.S) PANTALOONS FULL SUMMONING POUCHES+CHARMS+SCROLLS HD PICKUPSTICKS SUMMONING SKILLMASTER HD CANES (RUNE, ADDY, BLACK) HD SUMMONING ALTERS, OBELISKS R.S'S NEWEST EASTER EVENT ITEMS LIKE THE CARROT [IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg113/rs-kombatking/summonobeliskftw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg113/rs-kombatking/pickupstix.png[/img] [IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg113/rs-kombatking/darkbeast.png[/img] spirit tree teleport [IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg113/rs-kombatking/sprittreeteleports.png[/img] new dragon plate and new legs [IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg113/rs-kombatking/dplate.png[/img] [IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg113/rs-kombatking/plate2.png[/img] UPDATED, I HAVE ADDED SOME NEW STUFF! [IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg113/rs-kombatking/lel.png[/img] [IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg113/rs-kombatking/fullpumpkinftw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg113/rs-kombatking/fullblackelite.png[/img] MORE COMING SOON, IM CURRENTLY WORKING ON ALL THE PVP PLATEBODYS, LEGS, (ALREADY GOT THE WEAPONS AND HELMS)
i am currently converting loooooads of models lol like moonclan armour, hunter clothes like larupia, spotted capes and so on so expect client updates often!
[url=http://WWW.GARYSCAPE.FORUMOTION.NET]WWW.GARYSCAPE.FORUMOTION.NET[/url] PLEASE NOTE YOU NEED MY CLIENT TO SEE MY CUSTOM ITEMS! [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=6TJ4E8H6]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=6TJ4E8H6[/url] ILL BE UPLOADING A NEW CLIENT WITH UPDATED ITEMS AND OBJECTS LATER ON TONIGHT.
a few little things players should know before joining,
i do not know nor will i ever sell staff postions! on here any staff members have had to earn by showing loyality to garyscape, and be a community member!
having said that, if you do come to garyscape beta, have a good time and enjoy your stay!
thanks gary

item.title: New server in work
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“Hannah101, post:5, topic:273714”][quote author=Denoria link=topic=361711.msg2750365#msg2750365 date=1239869081]
Looking good.

Edit: No no wait…ive seen these pictures some where else…is this even yours…

Thanks,
Denoria.
[/quote]

I have posted them for gary in many other places xD so uve might have seen them somwhere else but gareh did make it

I see you good in models nice work ,gl with it…

i didnt make it gary did hehe i just posted it for him as he is busy alot[/quote]Oh, ok lol, nice job.

Thanks,
Denz

item.title: New server in work
item.dc:creator: @Hannah101 Hannah101
item.description:
@Hannah101 wrote:

hey,

Garyscape is a newly formed private server, ITS STILL IN CONSTRUCTION!. so if you do decide to drop by please remember its in a beta stage atm, i want a few players online to test things for me and tell what you think, how it can be improved etc, ok ill start with the features:

BOTH SOUL WAR NPCS, AVATAR OF DESTRUCTION, AVATAR OF CREATION.
ALL SKILLS WORK (IM WORKING ON CUSTOM HUNTER, CONSTRUCTION, SUMMONING AS WE SPEAK.)
ALL 4 GODWAR BOSSES, (including 30 killcount to enter the godwar room, kill count goes to 0 on teleport)
ALL WORKING PRAYERS, INCLUDING CHIVARLY AND PIETY AND PROTECT 1 ITEM PRAYER.
FULLY WORKING BANK PINS

full slayer tower, including hd darkbeasts, jellys, abby demons, and bloodvelds, (on the unreleased client atm still adding stuff) slayer npcs need the slayer wepons or the slayer helm or there hits will be doubled

full orb enchating mini game, including cutting+fletching the staffs, attaching the orbs, and enchanting the orbs

Fully working fightpits, with working viewing orbs and timers till the next game starts
Perfect wilderness levels , including attacking ranges, and no teleporting out past lvl 20 (working teleblock and venge, venge other and skulling if u attack another player, barrage freezes.

kalphite queen lair added, chaos ellemental, kbd including the posionos spiders near the lever that posion you)
(GENIE LAMPS FULLY WORK, GIVING U 2K EXP IN THE SKILL OR YOUR CHOICE)
RARE ITEMS ARE OBTAINED BY CHRISTMAS CRACKERS, AND CHRISTMAS CRACKERS ARE OBTAINED THREW CLUE SCROLLS LVL 3, FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY!

cluescrolls are in lvl 1, lvl 2, lvl 3 catagory, including a zamorak mage on lvl 3 clues
the dfs dosent float it moves like it should, spirit shields come with sigil attatching
Gilded alters work! using bones upon alter, including the stillgfx

There is trimmed and untrimmed skill capes all needing 99 to buy+wear

BUT LIKE I SAID THIS SERVER IS STILL IN A BETA STAGE, AND IS CONSTANTLY BEING UPDATED, AND IMPROVED!

heres a list of some items we have

flared pants (including lots of recolours)
Gnome scarf
staff capes (credits to silentcj for the modesl)
all elegant colours (including pink elegant, gilded elegant, camo elegant)
hween and santa recolours (including pink)
all the void helms
granite plate, helm, boots
dragon pickaxe
full jester robes (including the staff)
bandos warspear (credits to silentcj for the model)
r.s’s new dragon platebody, plus the new look dragon legs (with the spikes) 100% credits to me for getting/converting the models

ALL PVP WEAPONS, INCLUDING PERFECTLY ANIMATED BODYS/LEGS
full black elite
all amulet ts
powdered wigs, sleeping cap
Dragon claws,
bandos whip+ gloves (credits to silentcj
pirate hat and eyepatch
Dragon lumps and shards for the dplate (100 percent credits to me for finding/converting the model)
barrow boots
chinchompas
cavaliar recolours
beret recolours
Black and gold mystic recolours
armadyl staff
bandos+dragon cbow (fully working) including bolts on the floor after fired (and poisoning)
r.s’s halloween event reward (broomstick)
Gilded dhide
White dhide
Lave dhide
pink dhide
whip recolours
full santa armour
full ninja armour
all of the ususal stuff like visage, bandos armadyl, godswords, dfh

HAVE CURRENTLY CONVERTED THESE ITEMS FROM THE R.S CACHE AND THEY FULLY ANIMATE

NEW HD LOOK PORTALS
NEW HD HALLOWEEN DECORATIONS (CHRISTMAS, EASTER)
NEW HD NPCS SUCH AS ADMIRAL GRAARDOR (IDK WHAT TO CALL HIM LOL)
NEW HD DARKBEAST NPC
NEW HD SLAYER NPCS
NEW HD BARROWS NPCS+ARMOUR
FULL LUNAR ROBES

FULL PUMPKIN COSTUME (H’WEEN EVENT REWARD FROM R.S)
PANTALOONS
FULL SUMMONING POUCHES+CHARMS+SCROLLS
HD PICKUPSTICKS SUMMONING SKILLMASTER
HD CANES (RUNE, ADDY, BLACK)
HD SUMMONING ALTERS, OBELISKS
R.S’S NEWEST EASTER EVENT ITEMS LIKE THE CARROT



spirit tree teleport

new dragon plate and new legs


UPDATED, I HAVE ADDED SOME NEW STUFF!



MORE COMING SOON, IM CURRENTLY WORKING ON ALL THE PVP PLATEBODYS, LEGS, (ALREADY GOT THE WEAPONS AND HELMS)

i am currently converting loooooads of models lol like moonclan armour, hunter clothes like larupia, spotted capes and so on so expect client updates often!

WWW.GARYSCAPE.FORUMOTION.NET
PLEASE NOTE YOU NEED MY CLIENT TO SEE MY CUSTOM ITEMS!
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=6TJ4E8H6
ILL BE UPLOADING A NEW CLIENT WITH UPDATED ITEMS AND OBJECTS LATER ON TONIGHT.

a few little things players should know before joining,

i do not know nor will i ever sell staff postions! on here any staff members have had to earn by showing loyality to garyscape, and be a community member!

having said that, if you do come to garyscape beta, have a good time and enjoy your stay!

thanks
gary
